name: Better Call Someone
description:
"Better Call Someone" is a live-action side-scroller 2D platformer game, made during the "Strange Adaption Jam" (you can probably already guess from where is the main game theme) using Godot v3 Game Engine. Time took around 2-3 half-full days.

Play as "Jimmy" or "Kimmy" - lawyers who somehow managed to get in this unusual situation...

You're standing on truck which appears to be some kind of restaurant food delivery (or is it?) going pretty fast on highway. The cops are after you (or the trucks?) and try every possible way to shoot at you. Evade the cop bullets and chase the cartel money falling literally down from sky! Also - don't  fall off the truck!

User arrow keys or WASDto move around and jump.

Good luck, post your highest scores! :)

Most artwork from kenney.nl - https://www.kenney.nl/assets?q=2d with my slight color and graphic modifications.

Background from https://opengameart.org/content/3-parallax-backgrounds with pixelated modifications.

Money sprite asset from https://havran.itch.io/dollar
